nodes.text: The Imperial Knights Training Facility was a training academy on Coruscant for the Imperial Knights following the Second Imperial Civil War. In 138 ABY, Master Yalta Val was appointed the Prefect of the Imperial Knights Training Facility and tasked with finding new recruits. Val was an effective teacher and his students participated in the liberation of the Mon Calamari Shipyards. The following year, in 139 ABY, Admiral Gar Stazi visited the training facility to inform Val of a new Galactic Federation Triumvirate campaign to hunt down war criminals.
